name: UpdateHubdbDraftTable
description:
Update or modify a HubDB table draft in HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to update an existing HubDB table by adding or removing columns, or restoring an archived table. Changes apply only to the draft version until published. Ensure all columns are included in the request to avoid deletion.

parameters.name: table_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the HubDB table to update.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table to update.

parameters.name: hubdb_table_update_request
parameters.description: JSON object containing details about the HubDB table update, including columns and metadata.

dynamicMetaTags.description: Specifies the key value pairs of the [metadata fields](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/hubdb#dynamic-pages) with the associated column IDs.

allowPublicApiAccess.description: Specifies whether the table can be read by public without authorization

useForPages.description: Specifies whether the table can be used for creation of dynamic pages

foreignTableId.description: The id of another table to which the column refers/points to.

createdByUserId.description: The ID of the user who created the option.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the option was created, in ISO 8601 format.

name.description: An internal name assigned to the option, distinct from the label.

id.description: The unique ID of the option.

label.description: A user-friendly label that identifies the option.

updatedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who last updated the option.

type.description: Indicates the category or data type of the option (e.g., string, number).

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the option was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

options.description: Options to choose for select and multi-select columns

foreignColumnId.description: The id of the column from another table to which the column refers/points to.

columns.description: List of columns in the table

enableChildTablePages.description: Specifies creation of multi-level dynamic pages using child tables

allowChildTables.description: Specifies whether child tables can be created

parameters.name: return_archived_tables
parameters.description: Set to true to return archived tables. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return archived tables. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: populate_foreign_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to populate foreign ID values in the table result.

value_schema.description: Set this to `true` to populate foreign ID values in the result.

parameters.name: retrieve_localized_schema
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve the localized schema of the HubDB table, if available.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return archived tables. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return archived tables. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: includeForeignIds
parameters.description: Set this to `true` to populate foreign ID values in the result.

value_schema.description: Set this to `true` to populate foreign ID values in the result.

parameters.name: tableIdOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the table to update.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table to update.

dynamicMetaTags.description: Specifies the key value pairs of the [metadata fields](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/hubdb#dynamic-pages) with the associated column IDs.

allowPublicApiAccess.description: Specifies whether the table can be read by public without authorization

useForPages.description: Specifies whether the table can be used for creation of dynamic pages

foreignTableId.description: The id of another table to which the column refers/points to.

createdByUserId.description: The ID of the user who created the option.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the option was created, in ISO 8601 format.

name.description: An internal name assigned to the option, distinct from the label.

id.description: The unique ID of the option.

label.description: A user-friendly label that identifies the option.

updatedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who last updated the option.

type.description: Indicates the category or data type of the option (e.g., string, number).

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the option was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

options.description: Options to choose for select and multi-select columns

foreignColumnId.description: The id of the column from another table to which the column refers/points to.

columns.description: List of columns in the table

enableChildTablePages.description: Specifies creation of multi-level dynamic pages using child tables

allowChildTables.description: Specifies whether child tables can be created

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
